topic.title: Specialist Community Public Health Nurse: Family Health Nurse
topic.shortdesc: Since 2001 the World Health Organisation Health Organisation Europe’s Family Specialist Community Public Health Nurse - Family Health Nurse role has been developing in remote and rural areas of Scotland.
